name: Book and Rose - 2021
description:
There are 5 roses hidden in the garden, can you find them?

  • Move over the garden to uncover what was cultivated in each tile
  • If you found a rose click it to keep it clear

Why this mini-game?

This is a super-mini-game for celebrating St. George in Catalonia (23th of April). St. George is the patron of Catalonia and the day is celebrated by offering books and roses to your deep friends and loved ones.

Source code and previous years digital roses can be seen at GitHub.
